name: DR1FT
description:
A super small game inspired by Initial D and synthwave. Drift your wave through endless cars and relish the sunset. And don't worry if you have a feeling of...DejaVu while playing, it's part of the experience ;)

Source: https://github.com/silverweed/dr1ft

Made with: Godot Engine, GIMP

Credits: menu/gameover screen art by dualvoidanima.tumblr.com

Music: see in-game credits.
